languages.text: Я кричал, глядя на технопровидцев, деловито окуривавших плазменный генератор священными благовониями и читавших молитву пробуждения машинного духа. Молодой аколит, чье сердце дрогнуло, случайно нарушил литургию, запустив в энергетический контур Движущую силу прежде времени, и белое свечение взрыва ослепило мои бедные глаза.

traits.locale_text: Я кричал, глядя на технопровидцев, деловито окуривавших плазменный генератор священными благовониями и читавших молитву пробуждения машинного духа. Молодой аколит, чье сердце дрогнуло, случайно нарушил литургию, запустив в энергетический контур Движущую силу прежде времени, и белое свечение взрыва мои бедные глаза.

languages.text: I cried out as I watched Enginseers burning holy incense and chanting the prayer to waken the plasma generator's machine spirit. A young acolyte, his heart wavering, accidentally disrupted the liturgy, releasing the Motive Force into the power circuit before it was time, and my poor eyes were blinded by the white light of the explosion.
languages.original_text: Я кричал, глядя на технопровидцев, деловито окуривавших плазменный генератор священными благовониями и читавших молитву пробуждения машинного духа. Молодой аколит, чье сердце дрогнуло, случайно нарушил литургию, запустив в энергетический контур Движущую силу прежде времени, и белое свечение взрыва ослепило мои бедные глаза.

traits.locale_text: I cried out as I watched enginseers burning holy incense and chanting the prayer to waken the plasma generator's machine spirit. A young acolyte, his heart wavering, accidentally disrupted the liturgy, releasing the Motive Force into the power circuit before it was time, and my poor eyes were blinded by the white light of the explosion.

I cried out as I watched enginseers burning holy incense and chanting the prayer to waken the plasma generator's machine spirit. A young acolyte, his heart wavering, accidentally disrupted the liturgy, releasing the Motive Force into the power circuit before it was time, and my poor eyes were blinded by the white light of the explosion.

I cried out as I watched enginseers burning holy incense and chanting the prayer to waken the plasma generator's machine spirit. A young acolyte, his heart wavering, accidentally disrupted the liturgy, releasing the Motive Force into the power circuit before it was time, and my poor eyes were blinded by the white light of the explosion.

I cried out as I watched enginseers burning holy incense and chanting the prayer to waken the plasma generator's machine spirit. A young acolyte, his heart wavering, accidentally disrupted the liturgy, releasing the Motive Force into the power circuit before it was time, and my poor eyes were blinded by the white light of the explosion.

languages.text: Grité al ver cómo los ingenieros quemaban el incienso sagrado y entonaban la plegaria que despierta al espíritu máquina del generador de plasma. Un joven acólito cuya fe flaqueó acabó por perturbar la liturgia y desatar la Fuerza Motriz del circuito antes de tiempo. La luz de la explosión cegó mis pobres ojos.
languages.original_text: I cried out as I watched Enginseers burning holy incense and chanting the prayer to waken the plasma generator's machine spirit. A young acolyte, his heart wavering, accidentally disrupted the liturgy, releasing the Motive Force into the power circuit before it was time, and my poor eyes were blinded by the white light of the explosion.

traits.locale_text: Grité al ver cómo los ingenieros quemaban el incienso sagrado y entonaban la plegaria que despierta al espíritu máquina del generador de plasma. Un joven acólito cuya fe flaqueó acabó por perturbar la liturgia y desatar la Fuerza Motriz del circuito antes de tiempo. La luz de la explosión cegó mis pobres ojos.

languages.text: 当我看着引擎先知们烧着圣香，吟唱着祷文，努力想要唤醒发电机的机魂时，我哭了出来。其中一位年轻的侍仆心神不宁，不小心唱错了祷文，在不该释放的时候将源力释放到了电力电路中。于是，在一片爆炸的白光之中，我可怜的眼睛被晃得什么都看不见了。
languages.original_text: I cried out as I watched Enginseers burning holy incense and chanting the prayer to waken the plasma generator's machine spirit. A young acolyte, his heart wavering, accidentally disrupted the liturgy, releasing the Motive Force into the power circuit before it was time, and my poor eyes were blinded by the white light of the explosion.

traits.locale_text: 当我看着引擎先知们烧着圣香，吟唱着祷文，努力想要唤醒发电机的机魂时，我哭了出来。其中一位年轻的侍仆心神不宁，不小心唱错了祷文，在不该释放的时候将原初动力释放到了电力电路中。于是，在一片爆炸的白光之中，我可怜的眼睛被晃得什么都看不见了。

languages.text: 機関整備師達が聖香を焚き、プラズマ発生装置の機械精霊を目覚めさせる祈りを唱えているのを見て、私は大声をあげた。若きアコライトの心が揺らぎ、誤って典礼を見出してしまい、その時が来る前に動力回路に原動力を放出してしまった。そして、爆発の眩い光によって私の哀れな目は眩まされてしまった。
languages.original_text: I cried out as I watched Enginseers burning holy incense and chanting the prayer to waken the plasma generator's machine spirit. A young acolyte, his heart wavering, accidentally disrupted the liturgy, releasing the Motive Force into the power circuit before it was time, and my poor eyes were blinded by the white light of the explosion.

traits.locale_text: 機関整備師達が聖香を焚き、プラズマ発生装置の機械精霊を目覚めさせる祈りを唱えているのを見て、私は大声をあげた。若きアコライトの心が揺らぎ、誤って典礼を見出してしまい、その時が来る前に動力回路に原動力を放出してしまった。そして、爆発の眩い光によって私の哀れな目は眩まされてしまった。

languages.text: Ich schrie auf, als ich sah, wie die Maschinisten heiligen Weihrauch verbrannten und das Gebet sprachen, um den Maschinengeist des Plasmagenerators zu erwecken. Ein junger Messdiener, dessen Herz schwankte, unterbrach versehentlich die Liturgie und setzte die Motivkraft in den Stromkreislauf frei, bevor es Zeit war, und meine armen Augen wurden vom weißen Licht der Explosion geblendet.
languages.original_text: I cried out as I watched Enginseers burning holy incense and chanting the prayer to waken the plasma generator's machine spirit. A young acolyte, his heart wavering, accidentally disrupted the liturgy, releasing the Motive Force into the power circuit before it was time, and my poor eyes were blinded by the white light of the explosion.

languages.text: J'ai hurlé en regardant les technaugures brûler l'encens sacré et psalmodier la prière pour éveiller l'esprit de la machine du générateur à plasma. Un jeune acolyte, dans un moment d'hésitation, a accidentellement perturbé la liturgie, libérant trop tôt la Force Motrice dans le circuit d'alimentation, et mes pauvres yeux ont été aveuglés par l'insoutenable lumière de l'explosion.
languages.original_text: I cried out as I watched Enginseers burning holy incense and chanting the prayer to waken the plasma generator's machine spirit. A young acolyte, his heart wavering, accidentally disrupted the liturgy, releasing the Motive Force into the power circuit before it was time, and my poor eyes were blinded by the white light of the explosion.

traits.locale_text: J'ai hurlé en regardant les technaugures brûler l'encens sacré et psalmodier la prière pour éveiller l'esprit de la machine du générateur à plasma. Un jeune acolyte, dans un moment d'hésitation, a accidentellement perturbé la liturgie, libérant trop tôt la Force Motrice dans le circuit d'alimentation, et mes pauvres yeux ont été aveuglés par l'insoutenable lumière de l'explosion.

languages.text: Mühedyumların, plazma jeneratörünün makine ruhunu uyandırmak için kutsal tütsüler yakıp dualar okumalarını izlerken çığlık attım. Tereddüt içindeki genç bir havari kazara ayini bozdu, Devinim Gücü'nü güç devresine vaktinden önce gönderdi ve zavallı gözlerim, patlamanın beyaz ışığıyla kör oldu.
languages.original_text: I cried out as I watched Enginseers burning holy incense and chanting the prayer to waken the plasma generator's machine spirit. A young acolyte, his heart wavering, accidentally disrupted the liturgy, releasing the Motive Force into the power circuit before it was time, and my poor eyes were blinded by the white light of the explosion.

traits.locale_text: Mühedyumların, plazma jeneratörünün makine ruhunu uyandırmak için kutsal tütsüler yakıp dualar okumalarını izlerken ağlıyorum. Genç bir havari tereddüt ediyor, kazayla duayı bozuyor, Devinim Gücü'nü güç devresine zamanından önce gönderiyor ve zavallı gözlerim, patlamadan kaynaklanan beyaz ışık nedeniyle körleşiyor.
